name: Zuzu's Mirage
description:
Zuzu's Mirage is the first Project of Wondertale Productions, a small Indie Game Studio based in Switzerland with members of Bachelor Students at SAE Institute Zürich.

Its a story driven 3D Jump 'n' run Puzzle Platformer inspired by Games like Little Nightmares. Play as Zuzu as you wake up in a mysterious Circus called Mirage and discover the secrets behind Director Caligari and other memorable characters at the Mirage.

The Game is in Alpha Version and currently under development.
